name: get_available_delivery_slots
description: Get the earliest available delivery slot from the warehouse. By default returns only the single earliest available slot. Can optionally return multiple slots if earliest_only is set to false. Use this to find the next available delivery time for customer orders.

status_filter.description: Filter slots by status. Should always be 'available' to get bookable slots. Options: available, fully_booked, blocked.

postcode.description: Postcode to filter slots by coverage area (e.g., 'SW1A', 'EC1A'). Only slots covering this postcode will be returned.

start_date.description: Start date for the query in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-12-03'). If not provided, defaults to today.

end_date.description: End date for the query in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-12-10'). If not provided, defaults to 7 days from start_date.

earliest_only.description: If true (defaults to true), returns only the earliest available slot. Set to false to get all available slots in the date range.

query_delivery_slots.description: Flag to explicitly indicate this is a delivery slots query. Set to true when calling this tool (defaults to true).
